GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

reviews.title: Jenga
reviews.review_body: Fiddly fun for all the family

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an array of one user by username

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves an object of the requested review by id with the body included

review.title: Jenga
review.review_body: Fiddly fun for all the family

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: Updates a review by review id, adds to the vote count by the values of inc_votes and returns the object with the updated information

review.title: Scythe; you're gonna need a bigger table!
review.review_body: Spend 30 minutes just setting up all of the boards (!) meeple and decks, just to forget how to play. Scythe can be a lengthy game but really packs a punch if you put the time in. With beautiful artwork, countless scenarios and clever game mechanics, this board game is a must for any board game fanatic; just make sure you explain ALL the rules before you start playing with first timers or you may find they bring it up again and again.

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of the all comments by review id

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: posts a new comment to the review specified by review id, returns the posted comment
